page.title: 20FAUNA - BIRDS & BEASTS
page.content: In a rural area like this, there are lots of different birds and animals. Among the rarer birds are a pair of herons - nobody's goldfish can be secure. Another fish lover is the kingfisher - we have seen them hunting along the streams, so there must be fish in the streams. There are several badger setts and foxes abound. We've seen an old fox lope through a flock of sheep without disturbing them at all - yet they'll scatter and panic if a dog comes through. Some birds and animals are pests. Rabbits have increased tremendously in recent years and escaped mink have been seen. Magpies, rooks and pigeons all have to be controlled.
